Get a specific message

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}

>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"in":"path","name":"id","required":true,"description":"Id of the object, this can be a mongo Id but also a plain string (backwards-compatibility).","schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"OK","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"exists":{"type":"boolean"},"id":{"description":"Message Id this message is in reply to","type":"string"},"content":{"description":"The message itself","type":"object","properties":{"message":{"description":"Message","type":"string"},"channel":{"description":"ID of the channel this message should go to","type":"string"},"writer":{"description":"ID of the member that wrote this message","type":"string"},"writtenAt":{"description":"Milliseconds since epoch for this timestamp/date","type":"integer"},"replyTo":{"description":"Message ID this message is in reply to","type":"string"},"uid":{"description":"User Id this message is in is from","type":"string"},"lastOperationTime":{"description":"Time in milliseconds since epoch of the last operation on this object","type":"long"}},"title":"chatMessage"}},"title":"chatMessageContainer"}}}},"404":{"description":"NOT FOUND"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
